hero.description: Stop guessing which features matter. Drag nodes, draw connections, and let AI discover patterns hiding in your data.

problem.label: The problem
problem.title: Feature engineering requires
problem.titleHighlight: expertise you don't have time for
problem.description1: Finding the right features for ML models requires domain expertise, endless experimentation, and manual correlation analysis. Hours spent writing scripts, running statistics, inspecting distributions—only to miss the obvious pattern hiding in plain sight.
problem.description2: changes that. A visual canvas where you explore data intuitively, while AI surfaces the insights you'd otherwise miss.

dragDrop.title: Drag & Drop Canvas
dragDrop.description: Move nodes around intuitively. Organize your workflow visually.

smartConnections.title: Smart Connections
smartConnections.description: Draw relationships between features. See correlation strength instantly.

aiInsights.title: AI Insights
aiInsights.description: Let AI surface patterns and anomalies you would have missed.

featureStats.title: Feature Stats
featureStats.description: Distributions, missing values, importance scores—all on canvas.

instantCharts.title: Instant Charts
instantCharts.description: Generate visualizations with one click. No code required.

mlExport.title: ML-Ready Export
mlExport.description: Export engineered features in formats ready for your stack.

useCases.label: Use cases
useCases.title: Built for
useCases.description: Whether you're new to a domain or racing against deadlines, FeatureLab adapts to your workflow.

mlEngineer.context: New to the industry, tasked with improving an existing proprietary model
mlEngineer.challenge: Lacks domain expertise to identify which features matter most. Needs to quickly understand data relationships without weeks of research.
mlEngineer.solution: Uses FeatureLab to visually explore the database schema, discover correlations, and identify high-impact features in days instead of weeks.

dataScientist.context: At a fast-moving startup building a new product
dataScientist.challenge: Needs to rapidly prototype and iterate on features. Can't afford to spend weeks on manual feature engineering when product requirements change weekly.
dataScientist.solution: Leverages FeatureLab's visual canvas to experiment with different feature combinations, validate hypotheses quickly, and adapt to changing requirements in real-time.

productAnalyst.context: Needs to understand user behavior patterns for product decisions
productAnalyst.challenge: Doesn't have deep ML expertise but needs to identify which user actions predict churn, conversion, or engagement to inform product strategy.
productAnalyst.solution: Uses FeatureLab's intuitive interface to explore user data visually, discover patterns with AI assistance, and communicate findings to stakeholders without writing code.

upload.title: Upload
upload.description: Drop your CSV. We parse instantly.

whatIs.question: What is FeatureLab?
whatIs.answer: FeatureLab is a visual feature engineering tool for data scientists and ML engineers. It helps you explore datasets, discover correlations, and engineer features using an intuitive canvas interface—no coding required for the exploration phase.

aiInsights.question: How does AI insight generation work?
aiInsights.answer: Our AI analyzes your dataset to detect correlations, identify potential predictors, spot anomalies, and suggest transformations. All insights come with confidence scores so you can prioritize what matters.

fileFormats.question: What file formats are supported?
fileFormats.answer: Currently CSV files up to 10MB. We parse your data instantly and create an interactive preview. Excel, JSON, and database connections are on our roadmap.

security.question: Is my data secure?
security.answer: Yes. Data is processed locally in your browser during exploration. When using AI features, data is transmitted securely and never stored after processing.

pricing.question: How much will it cost?
pricing.answer: We're in private beta offering free early access to waitlist members. Pricing will be announced before general release, with significant discounts for early adopters.

availability.question: When will it be available?
availability.answer: Public beta is targeted for Q2 2026. Join the waitlist for early access and to help shape the product with your feedback.

cta.description: Join the waitlist and be among the first to experience visual feature engineering.

waitlistForm.success: You're on the list. We'll be in touch.
waitlistForm.errorGeneric: Something went wrong. Please try again.
